Containers.Name: Insync
Containers.Changes:
[center][img width='155px' src='http://d2631fvi2jdnb6.cloudfront.net/docker/limetech.png'][/center]
[center][font size=4]Insync Change Log[/font][/center]
[font size=3]1.0.0[/font] - Do not check certificate when downloading insync apt key - Exec the insync command - Reduces the number of run command and minor fixes - Changed url to get authentication code - Changed exec mode - Changed exec mode - Adapted add_account script for new insync version - Added TOTO and CHANGELOG in dockerignore - Added script for managing the ignore list - Generate locales in one step - Initial revision
Containers.Overview: Insync extends Drive's web functionality to your desktop by integrating tightly with Windows, Mac and Linux so you can get work done.
Containers.Description:
Insync extends Drive's web functionality to your desktop by integrating tightly with Windows, Mac and Linux so you can get work done.[br][br]
[b]Note:[/b][a href="https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https%3A%2F%2Faccounts.google.com%2Fo%2Foauth2%2Fv2%2Fauth%3Fscope%3Demail%2Bprofile%2Bhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.googleapis.com%252Fauth%252Fdrive%2Bhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.googleapis.com%252Fauth%252Factivity%26redirect_uri%3Durn%253Aietf%253Awg%253Aoauth%253A2.0%253Aoob%26hl%3Den%26client_id%3D468017360789.apps.googleusercontent.com%26response_type%3Dcode%26access_type%3Doffline"]Click here[/a] to get the [i]Google Authentication Code[/i].

Config.Name: Google Authentication Code (see link in description)
